subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Hedo Turkoglu and Rashard Lewis scored 20 points apiece Thursday night as the Orlando Magic overcame Dwight Howard’s foul trouble to beat the visiting Philadelphia 76ers, 98-88.
snippet: Hedo Turkoglu and Rashard Lewis scored 20 points apiece Thursday night as the Orlando Magic overcame Dwight Howard’s foul trouble to beat the visiting Philadelphia 76ers, 98-88.
